description: Feather reed grass (Calamagrostis acutiflora 'Avalanche') is an amazing ornamental grass with superior winter hardiness and spectacular blooms. It produces billowing, feathery clouds of white inflorescences that mix with its attractive, green foliage and create year-round interest. This grass can tolerate a wide range of soils, and its drought and heat tolerance make it a popular choice for gardens. In fall and winter, the foliage takes on a golden-bronze color for an extra splash of color to the garden. Its upright habit and rapidly spreading nature, make it perfect for mass plantings areas, as well as in containers and around patios. Tough yet attractive, feather reed grass is an excellent choice for gardens.
